turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there. I'm trying to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! what can i get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I would like one onion and sausage pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One chicken barbecue and both small and thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, i got, 2 small thick crust pizzas, the first with Onion and sausage, and secondly a Chicken BBQ.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, anythin else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! just give me one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bless you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: certainly! Alright The total for these 2 pizzas will be $32.33.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure! Your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i hope you have a great day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
